category.name: 4GD
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: DefaultLoadCountIncreaseRate
preference.preference_description: Sets the percentage increase of the size of each successive page in a result set from a 4GD cacheless search. The percentage is a ratio of each page to its successive page. For example, 120 (e.g. ratio of 100:120) will mean a 20% increase in results in each successive page. Valid Values: Any valid integer. 100 maintains the same page size.
